channel.title: Taser
channel.description: Hey does anyone know anything about tasers? I'm asking because i'd like to get my girl friend one.. because she has to travel up to london frequently and is sometimes on her own, and has also almost been raped before (just dont ask lol). Anyways she is always insecure about being on her own. So i thought she could do with a taser... Bad idea? you tell me, and anymore information on prices and perhaps a website i could see? The only websites i have found only stock the ones that shoot, i dont want to get her one that shoots, but one that you can jab people with. Anyways if your bored enough please feel free to reply to this. thanks.

item.title: Taser
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Get her some paper spray and tell her not to go down dark alleys at night.

Read full topic

item.title: Taser
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

RXVL:

It would be very easy to make one and disguise it as a disposible(sp?) camera. All you do is open the case up carefully and soider(sp?) two wires (or hot glue :D) to each end of the capacitor (the big shiny black thing if you don’t know) then drill two holes in the case and stick the wires out. Glue it back together and put something on it to make it less obvious (some of the cheaper cameras have a paper sleeve that you can slip over the casing). All you do is flip the switch and let it charge, then ZAP! There you go, homemade stun gun/tazer. Oh, and buy a camera with a switch to turn the flash on and off.

lol those are weak id recommend replacing the capacitor with something with more juice and bigger battery or just buy one…

EDIT: http://www.i-hacked.com/content/view/181/86/ in case you want to do the above.

Read full topic

It would be very easy to make one and disguise it as a disposible(sp?) camera. All you do is open the case up carefully and soider(sp?) two wires (or hot glue :D) to each end of the capacitor (the big shiny black thing if you don’t know) then drill two holes in the case and stick the wires out. Glue it back together and put something on it to make it less obvious (some of the cheaper cameras have a paper sleeve that you can slip over the casing). All you do is flip the switch and let it charge, then ZAP! There you go, homemade stun gun/tazer. Oh, and buy a camera with a switch to turn the flash on and off.

item.title: Taser
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:1, topic:94647”]Hey does anyone know anything about tasers?
I’m asking because i’d like to get my girl friend one… because she has to travel up to london frequently and is sometimes on her own, and has also almost been raped before (just dont ask lol).
Anyways she is always insecure about being on her own. So i thought she could do with a taser…
Bad idea? you tell me, and anymore information on prices and perhaps a website i could see?
The only websites i have found only stock the ones that shoot, i dont want to get her one that shoots, but one that you can jab people with.
Anyways if your bored enough please feel free to reply to this. thanks.[/quote]

Well, my friend, you aren’t looking for a taser. You are looking for a stun gun. People always get them confused…

Do a google search for stun gun instead of taser.

Read full topic

item.title: Taser
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_n00b Ooo Java
item.description:
@0wn3d_n00b wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:4, topic:94647”][quote author=Ooo Java link=topic=136992.msg1319430#msg1319430 date=1179181684]

You wont get past security with a taser. I’m pretty sure they’re illegal here. May not be though.

Buy her a rape alarm. Also, she’ll never be alone in London

I love jabbing myself with a taser. It feels pretty nice for the first 3 seconds, lol.

Then it just hurts for another hour?
[/quote]

Nah, it just starts burning and it really starts to hurt. My cousin did it for about 10 seconds I think, and he was bruised badly.[/quote]
Hehe, Sounds Painful.
I do think there illeagle in London, Good Luck though

[offtopic]Chris, get your arse on msn!!![/offtopic]
